title: Tom Cary's verdict: Ireland horror show as champagne rugby flows for New Zealand
text:
So there was no fairytale ending for Joe Schmidt after all. Ireland had stayed at the Hilton Tokyo Disneyland in the build-up to this game. But on the biggest stage of all, with the best squad of players Ireland had ever assembled, this was a horror show.

That is now seven quarter-final defeats out of seven at World Cups for the men in green. An unwanted 100 per cent record. But it was the manner of this defeat which will hurt them more.

Johnny Sexton had demanded that if they were not going to beat New Zealand - and of course they were heavy underdogs - then at least they should not die wondering. Unfortunately, that is exactly what happened.

Ireland will never know how they might have fared...
description: So there was no fairytale ending for Joe Schmidt after all.
